alert.note: Alert for Lancaster; Lebanon; Schuylkill (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 27 at 3:15PM EDT until June 27 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Lancaster County in south central Pennsylvania... Lebanon County in south central Pennsylvania... Schuylkill County in central Pennsylvania... * Until 400 PM EDT. * At 314 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Shenandoah to Schuylkill Haven to Timber Hills, moving east at 15 to 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lebanon, Pottsville, Ephrata, Tamaqua, Schuylkill Haven, Shenandoah, Annville, Minersville, Mahanoy City, Cornwall, Frackville and Myerstown. This includes the following Interstates... The Pennsylvania Turnpike from mile markers 261 to 286. Interstate 78 from mile markers 0 to 8. Interstate 81 between mile markers 89 and 92, and from mile markers 94 to 139. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
